articles.title: "Comfortable" With India Approach On Russian Oil, No Sanctions: US - NDTV
articles.description: The US is not looking at sanctioning India over its oil purchase from Russia, Karen Donfried, US Assistant Secretary of State for European and Eurasian Affairs, said on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Fuel refined in India is not considered to be of Russian origin. (File)
